paper.title: Logistics Financial Risk Assessment Based on Hybrid Particle Swarm Optimization and Neural Network
paper.abstract: This article mainly introduces a set of perfect logistics financial evaluation system through particle swarm optimization and neural network, so as to avoid the internal and external various kinds of logistics enterprises in the process of logistics and financial services. Through the application of particle swarm optimization and neural network theory to establish the logistics financial risk evaluation model, using the structure form and training principle of BP particle swarm optimization and neural network, the survey data is the sample, and the network is fully trained and tested, thus the accurate risk assessment can be made to the logistics financial risk.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究物流金融风险评估，通过粒子群优化和神经网络建立风险评估模型，这属于金融风险管理的范畴。
